text: "The Hardest Part" is a 1980 song by American band Blondie. It was taken from their fourth studio album Eat to the Beat. In North America, it was released as their second single from the album. In Europe, it was released as their third single from the album Union City Blue. It went to number 84 in the United States and number 86 in Canada. ==Track listing== US 7" (CHS 2408, February 1980) #"The Hardest Part" (Deborah Harry, Chris Stein) – 3:42 #"Sound-A-Sleep" (Deborah Harry, Chris Stein) – 4:18 == References == Category:1980 songs Category:Blondie (band) songs Category:Funk rock songs
